page.title: 07YOUNG PEOPLE IN LEWES
page.content: {"Lewes is short of things to do",}said all young people we questioned. Scouts and Guides are active, with outdoor opportunities, camping and community service. So are St.John's Ambulance, YMCA, many sports clubs, Lewes Boys' Club. But these do not fill all needs. The Coffee Bar closed after several months' popularity for lack of funds to pay helpers. Cuts in the County{Youth Service}keeps the Boys' Club chronically short of funds for maintenance and staffing. Commercial firms will not fulfil unprofitable needs of young people. The Odeon Cinema closed in the l960s. Pubs are no answer. There are hopes for an indoor Sports Hall and covered swimming pool {-eventually!.}But until then, many young people will make the trip into Brighton for entertainment and leisure
